text: "The Moon and the Sky" is the third single from English band Sade on their sixth studio album, Soldier of Love. It was released on 24 August 2010. ==Reception== Frank Guan of Vulture commented "Not even Sade can make the most of every opportunity, as this lofty song proves. Paired with a sad, introverted guitar line, her regret is impossible to mistake." ==References== Category:2010 singles Category:Sade (band) songs Category:Songs written by Sade Adu Category:Songs written by Stuart Matthewman Category:2010 songs Category:Songs about betrayal Category:2010s ballads Category:Soul ballads
title: The Moon and the Sky
